ygData.subject: RE: Black Silk Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: Using my invis song in Mistmoore I have conned indifferent to every single mob I have encountered thus far including will sappers.  I believe that deep inside
ygData.messageBody:
Using my invis song in Mistmoore I have conned indifferent to every single
mob I have encountered thus far including will sappers. I believe that deep
inside the castle there are some casters that will buff themselves and other
mobs with see invisible but I have yet to encounter these myself. I was
invisible to every single mob you mention in your post for 3 days of camping
MM.

I generally have camped in the Courtyard and when someone calls train I tell
my group to gather round me and kick up invis. As the mobs pour out of the
castle I target and con every one, all indifferent to us. I have not yet
actually ventured INSIDE the castle so your mileage may vary although it has
been posted that others have invis'd themselves successfully all the way
into the music room from the front entrance of the castle with no trouble.

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Crysarra de'Danaan [mailto:lucretia_71@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 12:23 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Black Silk Gloves
>
>
> From: Crysarra de'Danaan <lucretia_71@...>
>
> will sappers are in mistmoore castle i believe although this is from
> another source that someone told me about. somebody confirm for
> me...they see invis and are quite nasty in general. They look like
> really ugly hunched over women... i don't know what lvl but
> at 25 or so
> (the last time i saw one) they were deep red to me...shortly
> after that
> I quit hunting in Mistmoore...they usually come out with deathly
> heralds and ushers and gypsies and are part of REALLY nasty
> trains hehe
> the kinds that leave the zone littered with (and i do mean littered
> with) most of the people that happen to be in mistmoore and get in
> their way.
>
> Crysarra
> Chisarra
>
> --- roleplay@... wrote:
> > What level and wherw are willsappers? I don't remember those..
> >
> > Ranian Aeleroth
